entry.title: Photos Post 29: Special Events (after 1975), Part 48
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 3 Photos of the special event 1980-011x Pūjā, Rāhurī, India have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 1 high resolution and 2 medium resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 11 Photos of the event in the smallest gallery: India 1980.
Please kindly share the links with all our brothers and sisters.
[Note: 1 Photo uploaded on 2024-0112.]

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam
